Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: I bought this Camera to replace an old one that could'nt stand up to the beating electronics take on a deployment.  I am deployed to afghanistan with the Army and their are some really beautifull animals out here.  This camera is able to hold a tight, high deffinition quality picture even when fully zoomed in on a moving target.  The amount of options that are available to customize make it easy to adjust your style of photography.  This camera is worth more than I paid for it and I would glady purchase it again. All and all its a fantastic camera for a great price.

Reviews.Title: Alternative to a Digital SLR
Reviews.Author: E. Peak "JaWa"
Reviews.Content: I wanted several features that are not typically available in point and shoot cameras, i.e. enhanced zoom (this one goes to 18X), burst shooting capabilities, high definition video  capabilities coupled with high quality pictures. This camera offers all these features and several others that I probably will find useful without the high learning curve and bulk of a Digital SLR. The controls are placed where they will be handy without going through a menu everytime one wants to change modes and settings.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera at a great price!
Reviews.Author: C. McCombs "kriska1976"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera on a whim to get it right before our recent beach vacation.  I got it the day before we left and really had no time at all to play with it, but it didn't matter!  I used it on auto most of the time and have the most amazing photos from our trip.  The zoom is fantastic!  The pictures turn out crystal clear even at the full 18x zoom.  It is really light weight which I really love as well.  I haven't had great luck with traditional point and shoot cameras, even with the last nikon being at 12 mp, it still didn't turn out the way I wanted them to.  I really wanted to invest in a dslr, but it is a huge investment and they are very heavy to lug around.  This camera is the best of both worlds, ease and light weight and photos of a dslr.  I am so glad I decided to purchase this camera.  I do not regret it one bit!

Reviews.Title: Enjoy my camera
Reviews.Author: sharon
Reviews.Content: I have really been enjoying my camera a lot. Im still learning how to use all of the features,but it came with instructions that are easy to understand. up until now I was using a small point and shoot camera, and I wanted something with a wider zoom. This camera works well, and takes great pictures. I spent two days reading reviews, before I chose this camera, and decided this was the best one in my price range, and I have'nt been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Much good -- and missing three key points, for me
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Gold "somatic educator"
Reviews.Content: I use a camera for video as much as for still images.Much good:  image quality, color, digital viewfinder, LCD monitor, organization of menus/featuresMissed the mark:poor audio quality (microphone/ambient noise) when recording video (unusable -- requires external recording source)video resolution: 640 x 480 (I had hoped for higher definition)video limit = 2GB/clip, even with a 16GB memory chipI ended up locating a used replacement for my faulty Fujifilm E550, which also has 640 x 480 and quite decent video/sound quality.The E550 is not available, new, anymore.

Reviews.Title: Great zoom, great photos
Reviews.Author: Jennifer R. Meyer
Reviews.Content: I'm an artist, so I find myself taking a lot of pictures of my work- some of which are very small indeed. This camera is perfect for me! Not only does it have the standard macro mode for small objects, it also has a super macro mode for REALLY tiny objects. I feel like I'm holding a microscope!The zoom is also incredible. I've been able to capture every hair on a chipmunk from twelve feet away. Of course, the more you zoom in the more you risk blurriness from a wobbly camera...but it's still pretty amazing to see just how well the auto-stabilize feature works. It doesn't come through every time, but certainly more often than I expected.This camera also offers several approaches for photography, depending on your skill level. Honestly, the Auto feature works really well- it, of course, automatically adjusts the camera settings to current light conditions. I've taken indoor photos that look just fine. If you're feeling a little more adventurous, you can go with scene selection instead. You choose a camera setting from a list of scenarios- indoor party, flower, snow, night time, fireworks, etc. Or, if you're an advanced user, you can forgo the auto and preset options and adjust the aperture and shutter settings yourself. In short: a great camera with options for every skill level.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: MAL "MAL"
Reviews.Content: As a high school yearbook teacher on a shoestring budget, I am always on the lookout for good, affordable cameras.  This one is excellent.  It is inexpensive and takes excellent photos.  The zoom is excellent, even without a tripod, if you hold the camera steady, the 18X zoom works wonderfully.  Once good action settings are programmed in, the students can take excellent action shots.  The only complaint I have about the camera is that it takes longer than I would like for the photo to be stored, especially in the burst modes.  However, for the price, it is excellent.  We liked it so much that we purchased another.

Reviews.Title: Fujian 2550 HD
Reviews.Author: D. Sowell
Reviews.Content: Easy to use out of the box. Uses common AA batteries, alkaline or rechargeable, photos and videos are great in high or normal light. Not so good in low light but flash makes them OK even if the do not look to good in the viewer before hand. Zoom is greatt for photos but is noisy with video. Auto focus is great but noisy with video. Other than video noise as stated this is a great camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Super bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: Penn State Guy
Reviews.Content: So glad I finally made the move into digital photography without wasting time on pocket digitals with little zoom capabilities.  This FUJI replaces my old NIKON 6006 which I've enjoyed for years. AMAZON is always the lowest price and quick shipping.  Thanks AMAZON.

Reviews.Title: Unusable for movies
Reviews.Author: katana
Reviews.Content: The camera is great to take pictures, use soft manual mode. The AF is slow but accurate.IF YOU WANT TO SHOOT HD MOVIES FORGET THIS CAMERAMakes a noise from the AF (Can't be turned off) that gets recorded as an annoying sound on the background. Had to return the camera because of that

Reviews.Title: Problem with the camera
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera but after about a month of service(2 or 3 uses of about 15 photos each),I had a problem with my camera but I contacted the sellers in may 2012.Unfortunately I didn't get any answer since that time."I open the camera,I lose a part of the view.In fact,at the left upper angle appears a black dot,to clear it I have to use the zoom,so I lose a part of the view and the image seems bigger.I have the same problem if I use the zoom to the maximum.Has someone had the same problem?Can someone explains what causes that?Is there a solution?

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: JOSE Cabrera "Jose"
Reviews.Content: For a user like me -kind of starter- it is a wonderful machine. I have been taking lots of pictures and so far I have been very happy with them. For me, I got what is offered! The 18x zooming is a great feature and for distant objects is very good. The resolution is great, too. If you are just a casual photographer this camera will offer you a lot... maybe too much!

Reviews.Title: Good for beginners.  Can't take a bad picture!
Reviews.Author: ellybelly
Reviews.Content: This is my second digital cameral.  Great!  Hard to take a bad camera.  Recommended by a photographer for beginning and basic users.

Reviews.Title: Nothing special about this camera.
Reviews.Author: jrparnold
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife to replace a Kodak that she never really felt took good quality photos. After reading the reviews on this Fuji we were disappointed in the picture quality of it. It didn't take photos with much better quality than the old Kodak. Used mainly in the auto mode. Really couldn't recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Bad image Quatily
Reviews.Author: Joso
Reviews.Content: After a few months using it I start to hating the camera. I changed my Sony CyberShoot for this one (more expensive) and the quality of the images is really poor. I though it may be for the ISO settings but after the new configuration the pictures were the same. This camera really needs a lot of light to take a good picture, if not you will get blur and "sand-dy" pictures.Just now i bought a Nikon J1 to replace it, but if you are looking for a low price camera, buy any Sony point and shoot. you will get better pictures than with this one.

Reviews.Title: Starter camera
Reviews.Author: leek20
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera but picture quality is not all that great when camera is at full zoom. I would rocommend this as a good starter camera but not for this price.

Reviews.Title: A new learning curve.
Reviews.Author: rick d devin
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty good camera for the money. One drawback is downloading to the computer via battery rather than a electrical adapter. There are a great number of features and think it will just take some time to learn them all. Still a good buy.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: disappointed
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed.  I just received it and took pictures of my son graduation and the picture was not clear.  In the dark the flash didn't work well the pictures were just pitch black.  Would not recommend this camera not even to first time user.  Picture quality is horrible.

Reviews.Title: Great first camera
Reviews.Author: ms.kat
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my teenage daughter.  It is a great starter camera.  She really enjoys it.

Reviews.Title: Finepix S2500HD
Reviews.Author: Gary1948
Reviews.Content: Did not work properly upon receipt. Sent back for refund. Purchased a Sony instead that worked perfectly. Would not recommend the Fujifilm Finepix S2500HD.

Reviews.Title: Easy Use
Reviews.Author: Eleanor D. Hernandez
Reviews.Content: We purchased the camera for the wide angle/panoramic feature.  Haven't used it often enough to give a review.  It is pretty intuitive and light to carry.

ProductInfo.Features:
12.2 MegaPixel sensor captures enough detail for photo-quality 18 x 24-inch prints
18x Optical Zoom; Wide-Angle Lens
3 inch LCD screen; Dual Image Stabilization
Panorama Mode * SR AUTO & Face Detection
HD compatible * Capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix S2500HD 12MP Digital Camera with 18x Optical Dual Image Stabilized Zoom
